name: Earth Rush
description:
Project made for the Unreal Engine 2019 MegaJam in less than 24 hours.

Be the first to reach Earth!

Power-Ups:
- Missile: Shoot down your foes and obstacles!
- Cargo: Release a pile of obstacles to slow your "friends" down!

Controls:
- Move with ADWS / Left Thumbstick
- Use a Power-Up with Space / A
- Look behind you with Ctrl / B
- Slow down your rocket with Shift / X
